Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Interface JooqxBase<S extends io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlClient>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - Type of SqlClient, can be SqlConnection or Pool
    All Superinterfaces:
    JooqDSLProvider, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLBatchResultExecutor, SQLDDLExecutor, SQLExecutor<S,​io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,​JooqxPreparedQuery,​io.vertx.sqlclient.RowSet<io.vertx.sqlclient.Row>,​JooqxResultCollector>, SQLPlainExecutor, SQLQueryExecutor, SQLRoutineExecutor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Jooqx, JooqxConn, JooqxTx
    public interface JooqxBase<S extends io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlClient>
extends SQLExecutor<S,​io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,​JooqxPreparedQuery,​io.vertx.sqlclient.RowSet<io.vertx.sqlclient.Row>,​JooqxResultCollector>, SQLBatchResultExecutor
    Represents for an executor that executes jOOQ query on Vertx reactive SQL connection
    Since:
    2.0.0
